name: Katana Infinity
description:
(page still wip sorry)
[BEWARE : SPOILERS for Katana ZERO's ending]

Discover the first mission of ZERO after the war. and a new mysterious character, Infinity!

Contains :
- Cutscenes
- A Story that try to fit the OG lore
- A new gameplay
- A new enemy
- A Boss

Inputs :

ZQSD - Move
Space - Jump
LClick - Attack
RClick - Object
E - Activate Switches
Shift - SlowMotion
Ctrl - Walk

Compatible with Gamepad but not recommanded.
Window only.
